name: VaginalHysterectomySNOMEDCT
title: Vaginal Hysterectomy SNOMED CT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have a procedure of vaginal hysterectomy.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a vaginal hysterectomy procedure.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent vaginal hysterectomy procedures.  Codes used are to be SNOMED-CT codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
